briefTitle: A Study to Evaluate the Safety and Immunogenicity of GlaxoSmithKline (GSK) Biologicals' Quadrivalent Influenza Candidate Vaccine (GSK2321138A) Manufactured Using a New Process in Adults and Children
officialTitle: Safety and Immunogenicity Study of GSK Biologicals' Quadrivalent Influenza Candidate Vaccine (GSK23211381A) Manufactured With a New Process in Adults and Children

interventions.name: Influsplit Tetra™ vaccine produced by investigational process (IP)
Influsplit Tetra™ vaccine produced by licensed process (LP)

summary: The purpose of this trial is to demonstrate the acceptable safety profile and the immunological non-inferiority of the FLU D-QIV vaccine manufactured with this investigational process (FLU D-QIV Investigational Process \[IP\]) compared to FLU D-QIV manufactured with the current licensed process (FLU D-QIV Licensed Process \[LP\]).

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Subjects Aged 18-49 Years Reporting Solicited Local Adverse Events (AEs).
